meta.description: Determine which children the Lee family should take on their trip to minimize cost while satisfying various constraints.

vars.name: take
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a child is taken on the trip

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[c] * take[c] for c in CHILDREN)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of taking the children

constraints.name: max_children
constraints.description: The couple can take a maximum of 3 children

constraints.name: take_bob
constraints.description: Bob must be taken on the trip

constraints.name: alice_diana_conflict
constraints.description: Alice and Diana do not get along, so they cannot both be taken

constraints.name: bob_charlie_conflict
constraints.description: Bob and Charlie do not get along, so they cannot both be taken

constraints.name: charlie_diana_dependency
constraints.description: If Charlie is taken, Diana must also be taken

constraints.name: diana_ella_dependency
constraints.description: If Diana is taken, Ella must also be taken

constraints.name: min_children
constraints.description: At least two children must be taken
